data.title: Province of Oristano Vacation Rentals & Homes - Italy

data.text:
Rental unit in Riola Sardo

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 105 reviews4.98 (105)

S'omighedda

Cozy dependance in the style of Campidanese carefully renovated, in the Municipality of Riola Sardo just 15km from the beaches of S'archittu and Torre del pozzo, Sa mesa Longa, Putzu idu and S'arena Scoada and the Sounds Park of Su Tingiosu 8km from the golf course located in the town of Is Arenas. A little further south we find about 20km Mari ermi, Is Arutas until we reach San Giovanni di Sinis with its evocative promontory that divides the living sea from the dead sea with the archaeological area of Tharros.

Rental unit in Funtana Meiga

4.9 out of 5 average rating, 40 reviews4.9 (40)

Casa del lentischio (IUN: P3049 )

Casa del Lentischio is in the front row, in front of a beautiful sea,a few steps from the beach.The view from the terrace is wonderful.The house, independent, is on the first floor with garden in front and on the back, two bright bedrooms (double and twin),bathroom with shower, washing machine, equipped kitchen,large living-dining room with TV, terrace with sea view where to eat al fresco, outdoor shower,mosquito net,barbecue. Free wifi. Very close to Is Aruttas beach and Tharros archaeological site.

Vacation home in Putzu Idu

5 out of 5 average rating, 15 reviews5 (15)

[Putzu Idu] Seaside House / Exclusive Waterfront

Stylish house located in one of the most beautiful beaches in Sardinia. This house enjoys a unique seafront location with an exclusive position just 15 meters from the sea, with a spacious sea-view terrace and direct access to the beach. It has been renovated, furnished and equipped with everything: 2 double bedrooms with AIR CONDITIONING, 2 full bathrooms, a large living room with kitchen and PRIVATE PARKING. Perfect destination for all travellers. There are markets, bar, and restaurants nearby

Villa in Oristano

4.93 out of 5 average rating, 40 reviews4.93 (40)

Villa with Mediterranean park: Starlink Wi-fi Top

Starlink: top speed free wi-fi. Villa with Mediterranean park, set in a bucolic setting. It ensures an experience of total regeneration and contact with nature, without neglecting comfort and quality services. Total privacy and security is ensured (one of the safest areas in Italy according to statistics), and it is close to all essential services. Strategic position to connect to the best of the attractions offered both by the province of Oristano and with the north/south of the island.

Home in Paulilatino

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 200 reviews4.94 (200)

Love Nest in the Heart of Sardinia

The cottage on Via Pia is a historic 1880s house, typically built with local stone: the black basalt of the Abbasanta plateau. "Little house", because everything seems to be in a reduced format... the small windows, the bread oven, the courtyard. A comfortable and welcoming nest of love, suitable for those who want to have sensory experiences (especially gastronomic!) in this less known part of Sardinia, which alternates sea, plains, hills and mountains and a living, authentic tradition

Townhouse in Cuglieri

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 213 reviews4.97 (213)

Elegant home with amazing views

Our comfortable house lies in a peaceful traditional village, a fifteen minute drive from the beautiful beaches of western Sardinia. The roof terrace has wonderful views of the village, mountains, and the sunset over the Mediterranean. Experience good food, wine-tasting, fishing, ancient Nuraghic culture, crafts, yoga, golf, surfing or anything else you wish. We will help you arrange it. If this house is unavailable, please take a look at our other house by clicking on my profile.

Rental unit in Magomadas

4.92 out of 5 average rating, 135 reviews4.92 (135)

Apartment in Villa with pool (UIN: P 3511)

Attic apartment in Villa Paradiso with swimming pool and fantastic sea view. The apartment has a living room with kitchenette and double sofa bed, double bedroom and bathroom; a large terrace and a small terrace overlooking the bay of Bosa Marina. Ideal for family with two children. Use of the swimming pool and garden. COVID 19: The apartment is equipped with a continuous sanitization system, with release of nitrogen and hydrogen peroxide via "APLICATIONS RESPR 50".

Condo in Oristano

4.93 out of 5 average rating, 111 reviews4.93 (111)

Penthouse in the center overlooking the tower

Cozy penthouse in the heart of the historical center of Oristano with large panoramic terrace, living-dining room with large windows, kitchen, hallway, two bedrooms, bathroom. Optimal location to fully enjoy the charm of this medieval city, rich in historical, architectural, cultural places and attractions related to pastime and leisure. Suitable for vacation or work periods in a comfortable atmosphere. Unique Numeric Identification Code (IUN): P0380.

Condo in Torre Grande

4.92 out of 5 average rating, 26 reviews4.92 (26)

Bivano a Torre Grande - EUCALYPTUS 1

150 meters from a long sandy beach, in a quiet context, apartment consisting of a double bedroom, living area with sofa bed, bathroom and large terrace. It has a dishwasher, air conditioning, a washing machine, mosquito nets, and Wi-Fi. Extra bed and high chair are available upon request. Free street parking. Central location, ideal for visiting the rest of Sardinia. IUN Q4223. Tourist tax borne by the tenant, 1 euro per night for a maximum of 7 days.

Vacation home in Funtana Meiga

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 21 reviews4.95 (21)

[Funtana Meiga - Marina Breeze] 50mt from sea

Welcome to our sea-view apartment in Funtana Meiga, a charming place for an unforgettable holiday. Air-conditioned, located in front of the sea, this spacious 140 m2 apartment offers breathtaking views, two terraces with barbecue area, and all the comforts you need. Two bathrooms and two elegantly furnished bedrooms, with comfortable double beds (on request single), along with the sofa bed in the living area, can accommodate up to 6 people.

Rental unit in Santa Caterina di Pittinuri

4.93 out of 5 average rating, 103 reviews4.93 (103)

Funtana e Mare Surf Domo I.U.N P3560

The house is located just a few meters from the beach with sand and characteristic pebbles di Santa Caterina di Pittinuri ,quiet and safe sea location !!The house consists of a double room, a room with two single beds that eventually become a double bed, a large dining room, a small kitchen and a bathroom. From the terrace you can enjoy the sea during meals or a good aperitif!! The bay of Santa Caterina is a nice surf spot .

Home in Funtana Meiga

4.93 out of 5 average rating, 30 reviews4.93 (30)

Casa Relax sea view Sardinia

Relax with the whole family at this peaceful sea view accommodation, with a courtyard equipped with solar shower, sitting area, relaxation area with reclining deck chairs, barbecue area and laundry. Optional full kitchen with dishwasher, oven, microwave, coffee maker, kettle, toaster, extra sofa bed, LED TV and free Wi-Fi. Double room with view. Bedroom with bunk bed. Pets and welcome ðŸ˜Š
